decls.name: playerstate
decls.comment: stores the state of a player

decls.name: gamestate
decls.comment: stores the state of the game

decls.name: waitingForRoll
decls.comment: are we waiting for someone to have a go?

body.text: 2 player for now, no matter what's passed

decls.name: squareSize
decls.comment: size of the side of a game square

body.text: Odd numbered rows go right to left (for 36-sqnum)

decls.name: wormholes
decls.comment: stores start and end point of each snake and ladder

elseBody.text: Move the piece forward n squares

app.comment: Snakes, Chutes, call 'em what you like. Shake to roll.

nsLfkB3MiS099ggfVaIAGQ2x.text: Only (re)do translations if we haven't done them or if the language has changed

imps3BPR0JwmcGNzJCY8MV2F.text: Displays a random die side every 0.25 sec for <seconds> seconds and then displays the number passed. Used to simulate rolling.

app.comment: Snakes, Chutes, call 'em what you like. Shake to roll. Uses the phone language to give localised instructions.

imps3BPR0JwmcGNzJCY8MV2F.text: Displays a random die side every 0.2 sec for <seconds> seconds and then displays the number passed. Used to simulate rolling.

aZaTfusu7OuqZej2IvUat5YR.name: dieStyle
aZaTfusu7OuqZej2IvUat5YR.comment: Which die style to use. 0 (default) sprites, 1 pictures, 2 unicode text
